item.description:
Announcing a new Meetup for The New Haven Collective!

What: Foster's Happy Hour!

When: March 9, 2009 6:00 PM

Where: Click the link below to find out!

Meetup Description: Welcome to the Monday Happy Hours series!

This event is open to all, especially those who hate Mondays and especially for those who want to check out the different bar scenes in New Haven.

This week's location is: Foster's on Orange Street

If you've ever watched WTNH Channel 8 news you will know that Foster's is the restaurant of chef-extraodinaire Dave Foster, where he is a regular guest chef on their cooking & dining spot, always surprising with delicious and unique cuisine! (Showcasing "eccentric American" cuisine as their website states.)

We have GREAT specials for the group this week:

** Free samples of Chef Dave's amazing cuisine
** $5 Well Drinks
** $5 Wine
** $1 off all Beer
Contact:
Robyn-Allise 203.823.5302


Come early, come late, leave early, stay late, everyone is always welcome...

Nothing ever cancels Monday Happy Hours.
Ever.

***Bring a friend***
item.name: Happy Hour: Foster's Restaurant
